description: This file defines a React component for the main page of a chess game frontend, managing state for game position, move list, and controls. It composes several child components like Chessboard, MoveList, StatusBar, and GameControls, and handles user interactions such as starting a new game, undo, redo, and setting FEN.

methods.name: HomePage
methods.description: Main React functional component that renders the chess game interface and manages game state.

methods.name: handleNewGame
methods.description: Resets the game to the starting position and clears move history.

methods.name: handleUndo
methods.description: Removes the last move from the move history. Placeholder for FEN calculation after undo.

methods.name: handleSetFEN
methods.description: Updates the board to a specified FEN and resets move history.

methods.name: handleStatusUpdate
methods.description: Updates the ARIA live region with status messages for screen readers.
